name: A Blazing Storm of Metal!

name: A New World

name: Abbadomon
xros_req:
Assembly Requirements [Assembly -6] 4 [Negamon]
When this would be played, by placing the specified cards from the trash under it, reduce the play cost.
main_effect:
[On Play] [When Digivolving] If there are 4 or more total [Negamon] in your trash and your Digimon's digivolution cards, you may play 1 [Abbadomon Core] from your hand or trash to your empty breeding area without paying the cost.
[End of All Turns] [Once Per Turn] By placing 1 level 6 or lower Digimon card with [Negamon] in its text from your trash as this Digimon's top digivolution card, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with the same level as the placed card.
alt_effect:
Assembly Requirements [Assembly -6] 4 [Negamon]
When this would be played, by placing the specified cards from the trash under it, reduce the play cost.

name: Abbadomon Core
main_effect:
[Breeding] [Opponent's Turn] When one of your opponent's Digimon attacks, by returning 4 [Negamon] from your trash or your Digimon's digivolution cards to the bottom of the Digi-Egg deck, this Digimon moves to the battle area.
＜Collision＞ (During this Digimon's attack, all of your opponent's Digimon gain ＜Blocker＞, and must block if possible.)
＜Piercing＞ (When this Digimon attacks and deletes an opponent's Digimon and survives the battle, it performs any security checks it normally would.)
＜Security A. +1＞ (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card.)
＜Reboot＞ (Unsuspend this Digimon during your opponent's unsuspend phase.)
＜Blocker＞ (At blocker timing, by suspending this Digimon, it becomes the attack target.)
[When Moving] [When Digivolving] [When Attacking] By placing 3 level 6 or lower Digimon cards with [Negamon] in their texts from your trash as this Digimon's top digivolution cards, delete all of your opponent's lowest level Digimon.

name: Absolute Blast
main_effect: [Main] Trash the bottom digivolution card of 1 of your opponent's Digimon. Then, return 1 of your opponent's Digimon with no digivolution cards to the bottom of its owner's deck.
source_effect: Security Effect [Security] Activate this card's [Main] effects.
set_name: ['BT-05: Booster Battle Of Omni', 'Summer 2022 Dash Pack']

name: Achillesmon
main_effect:
[When Digivolving] If you have 2 or fewer security cards, ＜Recovery +1 (Deck)＞ (Place the top card of your deck on top of your security stack.)
[When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] If you have 3 or more security cards, 1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -5000 DP for the turn. If you have 3 or fewer security cards, gain 2 memory.

name: Achillesmon
main_effect:
[When Digivolving] Suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon. Then, 1 of their Digimon can't unsuspend until the end of their turn.
[All Turns] When this Digimon deletes an opponent's Digimon in battle, if you have 3 or more security cards, trash the top card of your opponent's security stack. If you have 3 or fewer, gain 2 memory.
